constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
CONARA Name: Liverpool Road Conservation Area
TPPNT Ref: RBK.05.10Tree ref: T1Tree type: COMM3Description: RBK Order no: 05 Year: 2010

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: T.1 Pine - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points in order to reduce the spread of outer laterals back into main canopy and retain natural shape, crown lift secondary and tertiary growth only to 2m from ground level & remove any deadwood.T.2 Beech - 1.5m (15%) Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points and continue to monitor.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Pine - Crown lift by 1-2m to improve clearance over driveway. Reduce canopy by 2m in height and 1m in lateral spread, deadwood, shape and balance remainder of tree.T.2 Beech - Reduce canopy by 1m in height and 1m in lateral spread to contain spread, lessen weight and potential for failure (Ganoderma).
